plot outline: In a beautiful sleepy town of Panchgani lives a strict, principled professor with her equally rebellious and difficult daughter. In a quirky twist of fate, the professor meets with an accident and her memory travels back to the age of twenty. What follows is the total role reversal for the daughter, who does not know how to handle the situation. The only saving grace here is the psychiatrist who is treating her mother. On coming abreast with a completely different side of the mother's personality, she sets on a journey to find out about her mother's past. Will she be able to mend the troubled relationship she had with her mother? Will the psychiatrist be able to revive back the professor's memory?
title: Madhuri
plot: In a beautiful sleepy town of Panchgani lives a strict, principled professor with her equally rebellious and difficult daughter. In a quirky twist of fate, the professor meets with an accident and her memory travels back to the age of twenty. What follows is the total role reversal for the daughter, who does not know how to handle the situation. The only saving grace here is the psychiatrist who is treating her mother. On coming abreast with a completely different side of the mother's personality, she sets on a journey to find out about her mother's past. Will she be able to mend the troubled relationship she had with her mother? Will the psychiatrist be able to revive back the professor's memory?

_Madhuri_ (qv) a strict college professor and disciplined mother meets with an accident leading to loss of her memory._Madhuri_ (qv)'s memory goes back to age of 20 years and believes she is still young and unmarried only thing causing her problem is her weight.Her daughter Kavya who was to run away from the house due her strictness takes the responsibility of her mother.Kavya with a Pshycatrist Dr Tushar tires to find past of _Madhuri_ (qv) to get her back to normal.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
